scan_table_check.description: An ATF test that does not contain a single active test step does not provide any value. It is likely that the ATF test has been created unintendedly or the actual implementation of the test is no longer required or was simply forgotten. Either way, an application should not contain empty ATF tests.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF test must contain steps
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Either implement the ATF test by adding at least one ATF active test step or delete the ATF test if it is no longer needed.
scan_table_check.short_description: An ATF test must contain at least one active test step
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF test must contain steps
